simplelist.member: Click button "Restore defaults" to restore the predefined configuration values.

sect3.title: BPEL Operator E-Mail address
sect3.para: When specified, this string will be used for the BPEL Operator E-Mail address.

sect3.title: Outgoing SMTP Server
sect3.para: When specified, this server name will be used as an Outgoing SMTP Server.

sect3.title: Email header for all e-mails
sect3.para: When specified, this string will be used for the Email header for all e-mails.

sect3.title: Subject for error alert mail
sect3.para: When specified, this string will be used for the subject for error alert mail.

sect3.title: E-Mail template for error alerts
sect3.para: When specified, this string will be used as an E-Mail template for error alerts.

sect3.title: Subject for error report mail
sect3.para: When specified, this string will be used for the Subject for error report mail.

sect3.title: E-Mail template for error notifications
sect3.para: When specified, this string will be used as an E-Mail template for error notifications.

sect3.title: Interval for instance expiration (hours)
sect3.para: When specified, this nuber will be used for the Interval for instance expiration (hours).

sect3.title: Global statistics flag
sect3.para: If this checkbox is checked, the Statistics gathering will be initiated.

sect3.title: Directory where .NET CLR assemblies must be stored
sect3.para: When specified, then there the .NET CLR assemblies will be stored.
